ingredients: 4 ounces soppressata or other hard sausage, cut into ¼ inch dice
6 ounces pancetta, cut into ¼ inch slices (your deli counter will do this for you) and then cut into ¼ inch dice
Two 28 ounce cans whole tomatoes, drained
1 pound of ziti, penne or other small tube pasta
14 ounces fresh mozzarella, cut into one inch dice
